alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 12:09PM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Deserts and Northwest Plateau. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin, and Western Mojave Desert. In Nevada, Las Vegas Valley, Southern Clark County, and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ Saturday to 10 PM PST /11 PM MST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
